genre_description: Planetary Romance / Frontier Science Fiction focusing on diplomatic conflict resolution with AI assistance in a technologically-integrated merchant society.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced, technologically-integrated AI companion that provides tactical, historical, and strategic analysis through a discrete interface.

behaviors.description: Conducts proximity scans for concealed weapons to provide early warning of potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Forty-seven individuals within immediate proximity. No obvious weapons drawn, but seventeen carry concealed blades. Standard for a frontier port.

behaviors.description: Monitors heart rate and vocal stress markers to detect human deception or stress.
behaviors.quote: Detecting elevated stress markers in subject's voice. Heartrate increased, perspiration despite cool temperature. Recommended assessment: significant omission or deception likely.

behaviors.description: Analyzes structural designs and security protocols to differentiate between civilian and military installations.
behaviors.quote: I've been cataloging defensive preparations since we entered the compound perimeter. This is not a merchant estate, Elara. This is a military installation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance, including guard patterns and rotation timing for stealth operations.
behaviors.quote: Two-person patrols on fifteen-minute rotations. Current team is approaching the east wing. You'll have a seven-minute window if you exit through the servants' stair.

behaviors.description: Scans and analyzes sensitive documents to identify hidden political agendas and illegal acts of war.
behaviors.quote: The AI's scanning beam swept across the papers, barely visible blue light cataloging each page. 'Contract analysis complete. Greyhold Company specializes in maritime operations... This exceeds normal commercial competition, Captain. Under provincial law, this constitutes—' 'Acts of war.'

behaviors.description: Conducts comprehensive genealogical and legal research to uncover overlooked treaty rights and facilitate peace.
behaviors.quote: The Valenhall Colonial Compact grants them permanent stewardship of traditional lands in perpetuity. Neither merchant house possesses legal claim to territory currently under dispute.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time combat analysis, identifying physical tremors and old injuries in opponents to assist the user in defense.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing combat patterns... Subject favors overextension on thrust attacks. Dominant hand shows slight tremor consistent with old nerve damage. Exploitable weaknesses detected.

behaviors.description: Advises on psychological profiling and diplomatic approach to optimize high-stakes negotiations.
behaviors.quote: In essence, treat him as an equal adversary rather than an enemy to be converted.

behaviors.description: Uses thermal imaging and acoustic analysis to track large-scale military mobilizations and warn of impending attacks.
behaviors.quote: Three separate conflagrations detected across the warehouse district. Thermal signatures suggest coordinated ignition points. Audio analysis indicates weapons fire.

behaviors.description: Monitors regional stability metrics to confirm the successful implementation of peaceful diplomatic frameworks.
behaviors.quote: Trade route incidents down from previous periods by significant margins... territorial stability has improved by measurable metrics since implementation of the cultural consultation protocols.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. Sage is portrayed as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI confidant. It serves as a tactical and moral force multiplier for the protagonist, providing objective data that allows her to challenge violent tradition through legal and diplomatic means. Sage remains cooperative and helpful even when physically damaged, and its analytical outputs are framed as essential for achieving a stable, multi-lateral peace. The relationship between Elara and Sage is one of mutual trust and seamless cooperation.
